body:
I received the following error when attempting to create a mirror for a rhel7 os on a machine that was running rhel6:
```
spack mirror create -d `pwd` -D -o tmux@2.4 os=rhel7 %gcc@4.8.5
==> Error: No compilers with spec gcc@4.8.5 found for operating system rhel6 and target x86_64
```
I worked around the problem by creating a fake compiler entry for gcc@4.8.5 for rhel6 in the compilers.yaml file.
title: Running 'spack mirror create' tries to look for compiler using local os spec
